title: Development of Self-Regulated Learning Strategies Using Learning Analytics Dashboards

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A course focusing on language proficiency improvement through project execution in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can interpret visualized data from a Learning Analytics Dashboard (LAD) and diagnose their learning progress with over 80% accuracy.
One can establish a specific learning adjustment plan (learning strategies, time management, resource utilization, etc.) based on personalized feedback.
In a project-based assessment environment, one can execute self-reflection-based learning improvement strategies three or more times beyond peer comparison.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
